In England, in the seven days to 03 May, there were 11,649 new confirmed cases (20.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 26 April, there were 13,497 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 14% (1,848 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 08 May is 3,872,997 (6,880.8 cases per 100,000 population).
